data.name: Titan Raga Sentiment Analysis
data.description: Automated sentiment tracking of 1,000+ reviews from Reddit & MouthShut. Built pipeline using n8n workflows, Jina AI, and NLP techniques. Developed GenAI-powered Google Sheets dashboards for real-time brand insights.

data.name: AI-Driven Financial Advisory Chatbot
data.description: Built K-Means clustering model with Silhouette Score: 0.42 for customer segmentation. Developed FastAPI-based chatbot prototype with LLM integration. Created personalized insurance planning recommendations.

data.name: Image Classification with ResNets
data.description: Implemented PyTorch-based ResNet model on CIFAR-10 dataset. Applied data augmentation and regularization techniques. Achieved optimized image classification accuracy.

data.name: Psychographic Consumer Segmentation Using K-Means Clustering
data.description: Segmented 2,763 consumers using K-Means clustering into three distinct psychographic segments. Created data-driven consumer personas for actionable marketing strategies. Designed targeted engagement strategies based on segment characteristics.
